bs

Class RobotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bs.RobotController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionStateListener, MessageReceiver

    public class RobotController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageReceiver, ConnectionStateListener
    Encapsulates a robot controlled over a remote interface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MOTOR_SPEED_MAX_FWD
      The maximum forward motor speed
      static int MOTOR_SPEED_MAX_REV
      The maximum reverse motor speed
      static int MOTOR_SPEED_STOP
      The motor speed associated with a stationary robot

      • sendMove

        public void sendMove(int leftSpeed,
            int rightSpeed)
        Sends a message to the robot to set the wheel motor speed
        Parameters:
        leftSpeed - the speed to set the left motor to
        rightSpeed - the speed to set the right motor to

        public void sendHeartbeat()
        Sends a heartbeat message to the robot

      • setSafeMode

        public void setSafeMode(boolean safe)
        Sends a message to the robot to turn safe mode on or off
        Parameters:
        safe - true if turning on safe mode, false otherwise

      • getLatestTelemetry

        public Telemetry getLatestTelemetry()
        Get the latest telemetry object received from the robot. Note that this returns null if no telemetry has been received yet!
        Returns:
        a Telemetry object representing the latest telemetry data received from the robot, or null if no telemetry has been received
